ISSUE.TITLE: Upgrade from webpack 3 to webpack 4
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The title pretty much tells it all.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Speed up builds by skipping installing requirements_all_ds.txt in CI unit tests (#2928) * Speed up builds by skipping requirements_all_ds.txt * Update docker compose file version * Start services before running commands * Add boto and Athena dependencies to requirements_dev.txt
